title: Message Condemning Lynching.
text:
Dear Sir: I have your letter of August 9th.

The question you raise is hardly appropriate for the governors' conference which is dealing with a special subject. Every decent citizen must condemn the lynching evil as an undermining of the very essence of justice and democracy. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Sam H. Reading, 24 N. 59th Street, Philadelphia, Pa.]
